short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide spoilers by blurring video and picture thumbnails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The goal of this extension is to allow users to avoid those pesky thumbnail spoilers. The extension allows you to choose specific websites for which all images will be blurred. There is an additional option to blur all videos as well (for avoiding spoilers on websites such as twitch). This extension was made heavily with the assistance of AI chatbot Claude.
